flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-35 = <<59-35=28>>28 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 28 seashells which is 28*(1/4) = <<28*(1/4)=7>>7 seashells
They are now left with 59-7 = <<59-7=52>>52 seashells
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
